duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technical support to customers for reported issues and perform root-cause analysis to determine solutions.
Debug software and hardware issues as necessary and execute actions to mitigate and resolve customer-reported issues.
Assist junior Automation Engineers with escalated issues and participate in customer optimization initiatives.
Conduct technical hands-on training for Automation Services staff and mentor new staff members.
Participate in on-call support rotation and coordination of 'hot fixes' for urgent customer issues.
Expand and improve the quality of knowledge by writing knowledge base articles and self-learning of new product and technology developments.
Participate in technical and core product meetings within the organization and keep abreast of technological strategy.

education_certification.credential: BS or MS degree in computer science, Industrial Engineering, Electrical Engineering or related technical discipline.
